title: Potential seen for tailoring treatment for acute myeloid leukemia

title_detail.value: Potential seen for tailoring treatment for acute myeloid leukemia

summary: Rapid screening of leukemia cells for drug susceptibility and resistance are bringing scientists closer to patient-tailored treatment for acute myeloid leukemia. Research on the differing drug response patterns of leukemia stem cells and blasts may show why some attempts to treat are not successful and why some patients relapse.
